item.title: My first script (powerminer + progress report)
item.dc:creator: @iloveit8 iloveit8
item.description:
@iloveit8 wrote:

begin
SetupSRL;
repeat
minero;
dropal;
ProgressReport;
until(false)
end.
should give you the progress report… if everything else is ok…

Read full topic

item.title: My first script (powerminer + progress report)
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

well heres my first script i made it with the help of the tut’s from akuma, some ores wont be dropped dunno y and the report doesnt really works

[code]procedure minero;
begin
repeat
findcolorspiral(x,y,rockcolor,3,3,515,336)
mmouse(x,y,3,3)
istextat2(9,9,‘Mine’,20)
mouse(x,y,2,2,true)
wait(rockwait+random(300))
until(invfull)
if (invfull = true) then
loads := loads + 1;
end;

Procedure dropal;
begin
dropto(2,28);
end;

procedure ProgressReport;
begin
WriteLn(’ …progress report…’);
WriteLn(‘Mined:’ + inttostr(loads) + ’ loads.’);
WriteLn(’ …’);
end;

begin
SetupSRL;
repeat
minero;
dropal;
until(false)
end.[/code]

Read full topic
